GeochemXYDiagram.name: AB Control Diagram (Ti)
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Proj from K and Ca Feldspar. Molar ratios used throughout the PER-GER ratio diagrams.
"AB" albite control line, muscovite and aluminosilicate plot along Ox axis.
K feldspar, Anorthite has no effect on sample position (it is project from)
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Stanley C. R., and Madeisky H. E., 1996 Lithogeochemical Exploration for Metasomatic Zones Associated with Hydrothermal Mineral Deposits Using Pearce Element Ratio Analysis
